article_title: A Brooklyn Pizza Shop is Charging an Obamacare Surcharge
article_text:

twitter.description:
You think you’re getting a slice in Brooklyn without paying an Obamacare fee? To quote the sign you read when driving into Manhattan, Fuggedaboutit!
